data.actual_result: No such option is present so you can't edit them. Note that it's the same for regular channels but you can still access channel settings via the 3 dots menu
data.expected_result: A "Category settings" option should be available to let you edit permission overrides for the category
data.short_description: Users with Manage Roles but without Manage Channels cannot edit permission overrides for categories
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server with Manage Roles but NOT Manage Channels - long-press a category
